Judul: PERANCANGAN FONDASI BATUAN DAN GROUTING BENDUNGAN UTAMA BENDUNGAN ASAHAN IV, KABUPATEN ASAHAN, PROVINSI SUMATERA UTAR
Abstrak:
Asahan IV Dam was built to raise the water level of the Asahan River to create a
high water fall that can meet the electricity needs of the Asahan IV Hydro Power
Plant (PLTA). This final project aims to design a rock foundation system that can
maintain structural stability and reduce seepage discharge in the main dam. This
design takes into account seven load combinations divided into three categories:
ordinary, extraordinary and extreme. After obtaining the design results from the
hydrological and hydraulics and structural design fields, further analysis of
subsidence and seepage analysis was carried out in the main dam with PLAXIS 2D
to obtain a feasibility assessment in the field of geotechnical design. The settlement
analysis consists of identifying the decline in the permit, examining the maximum
settlement and examining the effect of differential subsidence on the dam system. It
was found that the design met the criteria and was considered safe against the
decline that occurred. Meanwhile, for seepage analysis, the total head, pressure
head, and hydraulic gradient were examined. The values obtained were not in
accordance with the permit requirements, so that grouting was designed at the
depths of the upstream and downstream edges of the dam.
Kata Kunci: concrete dam, settlement, rock foundation, seepage, grouting, PLAXIS 2D.
